Seribu Lebih Kentongan Siap Ramaikan "Gelegar Kentongan RRI"
07 Nov 2019, 16:48 by Ruslan Efendi



Seribu Lebih Kentongan Siap Ramaikan "Gelegar Kentongan RRI"



Seribu Lebih Kentongan Siap Ramaikan "Gelegar Kentongan RRI"


KBRN, Subang : Keseriusan dari Lembaga Adat Karatwan (LAK) Galuh Pakuan untuk mensukseskan acara "Gelegar 1000 Kentongan RRI" yang dikolaborasikan dengan "Tarian Kolosal Persembahan Galuh Pakuan", sudah terlihat nampak.
Gelegar 1000 kentongan dan Tarian Kolosal Galuh Pakuan akan dilaksanakan di Lapangan sepakbola Panembong Desa Tenjolaya Kecamatan Kasomalang Kabubaten Subang, Senin (11/11/2019), yang disiarkan secara langsung di RRI Bandung.
Salah satuÂ  keseriusan dari Galuh Pakuan tersebut, terlihat dari kekompakan ratusan santriwan dan santriwati Pondok Pesantren Al-Ikhlas Raudlatul Uluum, serta para pelajar SD, MI, SMP, MTs, SMA, SMK dan MA, serta masyarakat Cijere Hilir Desa Tenjolaya Kecamatan Kasomalang, kompak membuat kentongan hingga mencapai 1.100 kentongan yang sudah selesai dibuat.
Pimpinan Ponpes Al-Ikhlas Raudlatul Uluum Ustadz Atep Abdul Ghofar mengatakan, hal itu dilakukan seluruh santrinya, guna mengejar target 1.100 kentongan.
"Sesuai titah Raja, kami bersama ratusan santri saya, harus mengejar target menyelesaikan 1.100 kentongan hari, maka terpaksa kami bersama para santri sejak 3 hari lalu bekerja keras untuk menyelesaikan pembuatan kentongan itu, meski dilakukan hingga malam hari," ujar Ustadz Atep kepada wartawan di Subang, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Para santri kata Atep, merasa terpacu untuk menyelesaikan pembuatan kentongan tersebut, karena mendapat dukungan dari Raja LAK Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi. Terlebih pada saat bersamaan dengan acara
"Gelegar 1000 Kentongan RRI" dan "Tarian Kolosal Galuh Pakuan" serta launching "Pesantren Berbasis Digital" pun, ikut dalam acara tersebut.
"Kelihatannya para santri saya, terpacu dengan adanya Pesantren berbasis digital, yang rencananya akan launching pada saat acara "Gelegar 1000 Kentongan RRI" dan "Tarian Kolosal Galuh Pakaun", yang akan disiarkan secara live oleh RRI Bandung, melalui frekuensi 106,9 FM, RRI Play Go, RRI Net, dan rri.co.id, dan ini yang menjadi semangat para santri kami," terangnya.
Sementara itu Raja LAK Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi menyebutkan, apa yang sudah dilakukannya bersama dengan masyarakat LAK Galuh Pakuan, sebagai apresiasi Galuh Pakuan terhadap konsistensi RRI terhadap kepentingan publik, termasuk terhadap semua pemberdayaan yang selama ini LAK Galuh Pakuan lakukan.
"Ini hanya sebagai timbal balik kami dan masyarakat kami terhadap RRI, dan kami sendiri sebagai Rakyat merasa memiliki RRI, jadi kalau bukan kami yang mendukung semua program siaran RRI, ya siapa lagi?, kami merupakan bagian dari RRI dan RRI juga bagian dari kami LAK Galuh Pakuan," pungkas Evi.

One Thousand More Kentongan Ready to Enliven "Bubutan Kentongan RRI"
Nov 7 2019, 16:48 by Ruslan Efendi



One Thousand More Kentongan Ready to Enliven "Bubutan Kentongan RRI"



One Thousand More Kentongan Ready to Enliven "Bubutan Kentongan RRI"


KBRN, Subang: The seriousness of the Karatwan Customary Institution (LAK) Galuh Pakuan for the success of the "Rumbling 1000 Kentongan RRI" event which was collaborated with "The Colossal Dance of the Galuh Pakuan Offering", is already visible.
The sound of 1000 kentongan and the Koluhal Galuh Pakuan dance will be held at the Panembong soccer field in the village of Tenjolaya, Kasomalang Sub-District, Subang, Monday (11/11/2019), which is broadcast live on RRI Bandung.
One of the seriousness of Galuh Pakuan, seen from the cohesiveness of hundreds of students and students of Al-Ikhlas Islamic Boarding School Raudlatul Uluum, as well as elementary, MI, junior high, MTs, high school, vocational and MA students, as well as the Cijere Hilir community in Tenjolaya Village, Kasomalang District, compact making kentongan until it reaches 1,100 which has been completed.
The leader of Al-Ikhlas Islamic Boarding School Raudlatul Uluum Ustadz Atep Abdul Ghofar said this was done by all his students, in pursuit of the target of 1,100 kentongan.
"As per the King's decree, we, along with hundreds of my students, must pursue the target of completing 1,100 kentongan days, so we are forced to be with the students since 3 days ago working hard to complete the making of the kentongan, even though it was carried out into the evening," Ustadz Atep told reporters in Subang, Thursday (7/11/2019).
The students said Atep, felt motivated to complete the making of the block, because they received support from LAK King Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi. Especially at the same time with the event
"Bubutan 1000 Kentongan RRI" and "Koluhal Galuh Pakuan Dance" and launching "Pesantren Digital Based" were also included in the event.
"It seems that my students are encouraged by the existence of a digital based boarding school, which is planned to be launched during the event" Bubutan 1000 Kentongan RRI "and" Colossal Galuh Pakaun Dance ", which will be broadcast live by RRI Bandung, through 106.9 FM frequency, "RRI Play Go, RRI Net, and rri.co.id, and this is the spirit of our students," he explained.
Meanwhile, Raja LAK Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi said what he had done together with the Galak Pakuan LAK community, as an appreciation of Galuh Pakuan for RRI's consistency in the public interest, including all the empowerments that LAK Galuh Pakuan had been doing.
"This is only our reciprocity and our community towards RRI, and we ourselves as the People feel we have RRI, so if we don't support all RRI programs, who will? We are part of RRI and RRI is also part of us LAK Galuh Pakuan, "concluded Evi.
